sen.j: 観察（かんさつ）とは、対象の実態を知るために注意深く見ること。
sen.e: Observation means to watch an object carefully to find out its actual condition.
Observation means to watch an object carefully to find out its actual condition.
Observation means to watch an object carefully to find out its actual condition.

sen.j: その様子を見て、その変化を記録すること。
sen.e: To watch its state and record its change.
To watch its state and record its change.
To watch its state and record its change.

sen.j: どれだけその変化を見つけられるかが重要である。
sen.e: It is important how much detail you can find in its change.
It is important how much detail you can find in its change.
It is important how much detail you can find in its change.

sen.j: 歴史・政治
sen.e: History/Politics
History/Politics
History/Politics

sen.j: 統治の諸機能のひとつ。
sen.e: One of the various functions of ruling.
One of the various functions of ruling.
One of the various functions of ruling.

sen.j: 刑事政策
sen.e: Criminal Policy
Criminal Policy
Criminal Policy

sen.j: 刑事政策においては、「保護」という語とともに「保護観察」という形で使われることが多い。
sen.e: In the subject of criminal policy, this word is often used together with the word "protection" to make a word "protective observation" which actually means probation.
In the subject of criminal policy, this word is often used together with the word "protection" to make a word "protective observation" which actually means probation.
In the subject of criminal policy, this word is often used together with the word "protection" to make a word "protective observation" which in fact means probation.

sen.j: 犯罪者を刑務所などの施設に入れず、一般社会で処遇することを指す。
sen.e: Probation means to send the criminals back to community under a special supervision instead of putting them in the facilities such as prisons.
Probation means to send the criminals back to community under a special supervision instead of putting them in the facilities such as prisons.
Probation means to send the criminals back to community under a special supervision instead of putting them in the facilities such as prisons.

sen.j: 自然科学
sen.e: Natural Science
Natural Science
Natural Science

sen.j: 自然科学の分野では観察とは何らかの目的のために対象を詳細に見、そこから何かを導き出す行動で、分析や解析などの基礎となる。
sen.e: In the field of natural science, observation is to watch an object carefully to derive something from it and it becomes a base of an analysis.
In the field of natural science, observation is to watch an object carefully to derive something from it and it becomes a base of an analysis.
In the field of natural science, observation is to watch an object carefully to derive something from it and it becomes a base of an analysis.

sen.j: 基本的には対象に対する操作を行わない点で実験とは異なる。
sen.e: Basically, observation is different from experiment in the way that it does not manipulate the object.
Basically, observation is different from experiment in the way that it does not manipulate the object.
Basically, observation is different from experiment in the way that it does not manipulate the object.

sen.j: 分解や解剖、生物学ではさらに固定や染色といった込み入った操作を行う場合もあるが、これはそのままでは見えない内部や細部を見るためであり、その操作によるその目的部分の変化を求めない点で実験ではない。
sen.e: The occasion such as decomposition or dissection or a more complicated operation such as fixing or coloring might be given in the field of biology, however, this is done purely to watch the inside or the detail of the object and it is still different to experiment in the way that it does not expect the change of the object by that operation.

The occasion such as decomposition or dissection or a more complicated operation such as fixing or coloring might be given in the field of biology, however, this is done purely to watch the inside or the detail of the object and it is still different to experiment in the way that it does not expect the change of the object by that operation.

The occasion such as decomposition or dissection or a more complicated operation such as fixing or coloring might be given in the field of biology, however, this is done purely to watch the inside or the detail of the object and it is still different to experiment in the way that it does not expect the change of the object by that operation.

sen.j: 観察には、定量的観察と定性的観察がある。
sen.e: There are two types of observation - quantitative observation and qualitative observation.
There are two types of observation - quantitative observation and qualitative observation.
There are two types of observation - quantitative observation and qualitative observation.

sen.j: 人間の感覚は定性的なので、定量化は重要な過程である。
sen.e: Since the sense of human beings is qualitative, quantitative observation is a very important process.
Since the sense of human beings is qualitative, quantitative observation is a very important process.
Since the sense of human beings is qualitative, quantitative observation is a very important process.

sen.j: 定量的な観察は特に「観測」あるいは「測定」などと呼ばれる。
sen.e: Quantitative observation is often especially called "assessment" or "measurement".
Quantitative observation is often especially called "assessment" or "measurement".
Quantitative observation is often especially called "assessment" or "measurement".

sen.j: しかし、定性的な観測も時に重要な情報をもたらす。
sen.e: However, qualitative observation often provides with a very important piece of information as well.
However, qualitative observation often provides with a very important piece of information as well.
However, qualitative observation often provides with a very important piece of information as well.

sen.j: 科学的方法も参照。
sen.e: See also scientific methods.
See also scientific methods.
See also scientific methods.

sen.j: 生物学ではまずはその形態、それにその動きをよく見ることが重視される。
sen.e: In the field of biology, it is important to carefully watch the appearance of the object and its movements.
In the field of biology, it is important to carefully watch the appearance of the object and its movements.
In the field of biology, it is important to carefully watch the appearance of the object and its movements.

sen.j: しかし生物には肉眼では観察できない細部に重要な意味があることが明らかになり、野外観察においてもルーペは重要アイテムである。
sen.e: However, it became clear that the important elements of living objects are often in the details which cannot be seen with our naked eyes, therefore a magnifier is an important item when you do an outdoor observation.

However, it became clear that the important elements of living objects are often in the details which cannot be seen with our naked eyes, therefore a magnifier is an important item when you do an outdoor observation.

However, it became clear that the important elements of living objects are often in the details which cannot be seen with our naked eyes, therefore a magnifier is an important item when you do an outdoor observation.

sen.j: さらに微生物の分野では顕微鏡を用いた観察がしばしば行われる。
sen.e: Also in the field of microorganism, the observation is often done by using a microscope.
Also in the field of microorganism, the observation is often done by using a microscope.
Also in the field of microorganism, the observation is often done by using a microscope.

sen.j: いずれにせよ観察から何かを感じることは生物学では発想の原点として重要である。
sen.e: Whatever the case may be in the field of biology, it is important to feel something from an observation as a starting point of an inspiration.
Whatever the case may be in the field of biology, it is important to feel something from an observation as a starting point of an inspiration.
Whatever the case may be in the field of biology, it is important to feel something from an observation as a starting point of an inspiration.

sen.j: 観察したことを記録する方法として，スケッチも重視される。
sen.e: Drawing is also valued as a method of recording the result of observation,
Drawing is also valued as a method of recording the result of observation,
Drawing is also valued as a method of recording the result of observation,

sen.j: 学校における理科教育においても、観察は重視される。
sen.e: Observation is valued in science education at schools.
Observation is valued in science education at schools.
Observation is valued in science education at schools.

sen.j: 小学校低学年-中学年などでは身近な生物の観察がよく取り上げられる。
sen.e: The observation of living objects which are familiar to us is often included in the curriculum in the early/junior years of primary schools.
The observation of living objects which are familiar to us is often included in the curriculum of the lower classes of primary schools through junior high schools.
sen.cmt: in the early / junior years of primary schools→ of the lower classes of primary schools through junior high schools.
sen.e: The observation of living objects which are familiar to us is often included in the curriculum of the lower classes of primary schools through junior high schools.

sen.j: また、かつては昆虫採集は理科の自由研究の課題としてよく取り上げられたが、現在はこれが少なくなっている理由のひとつに、むやみに採集するより、しっかり観察することが大事だとの方向性の変換があげられる。
sen.e: Insect collecting used to be popular as a subject of students' science projects, however, it is not the case anymore since the direction of education now changed to emphasize the importance of the close observation rather than collecting them randomly.

Insect collecting used to be popular as a subject of students' science projects, however, it is not the case anymore; one of the reasons is the direction of education has shifted to emphasize the importance of a close observation of insects rather than a random colleciton of them.
sen.cmt: since the direction of education now changed to emphasize the importance of the close observation rather than collecting them randomly.→; one of the reasons is the direction of education has shifted to emphasize the importance of a close observation of insects rather than a random colleciton of them.
sen.e: Insect collecting used to be popular as a subject of students' science projects, however, it is not the case anymore; one of the reasons is the direction of education has shifted to emphasize the importance of a close observation of insects rather than a random colleciton of them.

sen.j: 社会教育の場では、博物館や自然関係の団体が主催する自然観察会や自然観察教室があちこちで行われている。
sen.e: In the social education setting, there are a lot of nature observation meetings or nature observation classes hosted by museums or various nature-related organizations.
In the social education setting, there are a lot of nature observation meetings or nature observation classes hosted by museums or various nature-related organizations.
In the social education setting, there are a lot of nature observation meetings or nature observation classes hosted by museums or various nature-related organizations.

sen.j: 観察の諸問題
sen.e: Various issues of observation
Various issues of observation
Various issues of observation

sen.j: 観察という行為自体に何ら疑問を抱かない者も多いが、実はそこには大きな問題が横たわっている。
sen.e: Many people don't question about the act of observation itself, however, there is a serious issue involved in it.
Many people don't question about the act of observation itself, however, there is a serious issue involved in it.
Many people don't question about the act of observation itself, however, there is a serious issue involved in it.

sen.j: 観察という行為には人間の「認識」というプロセスが含まれているのである。
sen.e: There is a process called "recognition" of human beings involved in the act of observation.
There is a process called "recognition" of human beings involved in the act of observation.
There is a process called "recognition" of human beings involved in the act of observation.

sen.j: 観察者が誰であろうが(科学者であろうが)、認識は、心理あるいは脳神経的なプロセスであり、そこには以下のような問題が潜んでいる。
sen.e: Whoever the observer may be (even an scientist), recognition is a process related to psychology and cranial nerve and there are some issues involved as shown below.
Whoever the observer may be (even an scientist), recognition is a process related to psychology and cranial nerve and there are some issues involved as shown below.
Whoever the observer may be (even an scientist), recognition is a process related to psychology and cranial nerve and there are some issues involved as shown below.

sen.j: 先入観
sen.e: Preconceived idea
Preconceived idea
Preconceived idea

sen.j: 主観と客観
sen.e: Subjective point of view and objective point of view
Subjective point of view and objective point of view
Subjective point of view and objective point of view

sen.j: この問題は、トーマス・クーンによっても指摘された。
sen.e: This issue was pointed out also by Thomas Kuhn.
This issue was also pointed out by Thomas Kuhn.
This issue was also pointed out by Thomas Kuhn.

sen.j: 科学の理論の進歩は、認識が孕む問題と大きく関係しているのである。
sen.e: The progress of scientific theories is largely related to the potential problems of the act of recognition.
The progress of scientific theories is largely related to the potential problems of the act of recognition.
The progress of scientific theories is largely related to the potential problems of the act of recognition.

sen.j: (「パラダイム」の項を参照のこと)。
sen.e: (See the section of "Paradigm")
(See the section of "Paradigm")
(See the section of "Paradigm")

sen.j: 「客観主義」というものは、決して、想像されるほど、シンプルで磐石なものではない。
sen.e: "Objectivization" is never simple nor absolute as it is assumed.
"Objectivization" is never simple nor absolute as it is assumed.
"Objectivization" is never simple nor absolute as it is assumed.

sen.j: また、観察者の存在によって、観察される存在の挙動が変化してしまうことは、生物学や社会科学の分野では当然のこととして常に意識されていた(例えば生き物や人間、人間集団などは、人間は、観察で挙動が変化してしまうと経験的・常識的に知っていた)。
sen.e: Moreover, in the field of biology and social science it has been always known as a matter-of -course that the behavior of the object being observed is affected by the existence of the observer (for example, human beings are aware based on the experiences and the common sense that the behavior of any creatures, human beings and the group of human beings is affected by being observed.)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Moreover, in the field of biology and social science it has been always known as a matter-of -course that the behavior of the object being observed is affected by the existence of the observer (for example, human beings are aware based on the experiences and the common sense that the behavior of any creatures, human beings and the group of human beings is affected by being observed).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処はOKスペース調整およびピリオドの位置修正
sen.e: Moreover, in the field of biology and social science it has been always known as a matter-of -course that the behavior of the object being observed is affected by the existence of the observer (for example, human beings are aware based on the experiences and the common sense that the behavior of any creatures, human beings and the group of human beings is affected by being observed).

sen.j: しかし、物理学の領域においても、量子力学の発展以降は、物質レベルでも、さらに根深い次元で「観測問題」が扱われるようになり、&quot客観的な観察&quotというものが、この点からも揺らいでいる。
sen.e: However also in the field of physics, "the issue of observation" started being discussed more deeply even at the level of substance since quantum mechanics has been developed, and the concept of "the objective observation" has become unstable from this point of view as well.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: However also in the field of physics, "the issue of observation" started being discussed more deeply even at the level of substance since quantum mechanics has been developed, and the concept of "the objective observation" has become unstable from this point of view as well.

However also in the field of physics, "the issue of observation" started being discussed more deeply even at the level of substance since quantum mechanics has been developed, and the concept of "the objective observation" has become unstable from this point of view as well.

sen.j: ウォッチャー
sen.e: Watcher
Watcher
Watcher

sen.j: また、特定の分野や現象を観察、評論する人をウォッチャーと称する場合もある。
sen.e: The people who observe or review a particular field or phenomenon are sometimes called "watcher".
The people who observe or review a particular field or phenomenon are sometimes called "watcher".
The people who observe or review a particular field or phenomenon are sometimes called "watcher".

sen.j: 例えば、黒田勝弘（産経新聞ソウル支局長）を韓国ウォッチャーと言ったり、高成田亨（朝日新聞論説委員）がワシントンウォッチャーを自称したりしている。
sen.e: For example, people often call Katsuhiro KURODA (Sankei Newspaper, Seoul Branch Manager) a Korean Watcher, or Toru TAKANARITA calls himself a Washington Watcher.
For example, people often call Katsuhiro KURODA (Sankei Newspaper, Seoul Branch Manager) a Korean Watcher, or Toru TAKANARITA calls himself a Washington Watcher.
For example, people often call Katsuhiro KURODA (Sankei Newspaper, Seoul Branch Manager) a Korean Watcher, or Toru TAKANARITA calls himself a Washington Watcher.

sen.j: 政府が関与しているものでは、小売店や製造業、ゴルフ場やタクシーなどサービス提供業者に景気ウォッチャーとなってもらい、ウォッチャーの景気判断を元に作成する景気ウォッチャー調査（内閣府）がある。
sen.e: Among those which are related to government there are the economy watchers who are retailers, manufacturers or the service providers such as golf course owners and taxi drivers, and the government (the Cabinet Office) publishes the Economic Watchers Survey based on these watchers' verdict on the economy.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Among those related to government are economy watchers, who can include retailers, manufacturers or service providers such as golf course owners and taxi drivers; the government (the Cabinet Office) conducts the Economic Watchers Survey based on their economic assessments.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処はOKスペース調整および原文に沿って文を修正。
sen.e: Among those related to government are economy watchers, who can include retailers, manufacturers or service providers such as golf course owners and taxi drivers; the government (the Cabinet Office) conducts the Economic Watchers Survey based on their economic assessments.

sen.j: また、食品表示状況に不正が行われてないかを観察する中央食品表示ウォッチャー（農林水産省）などもある。
sen.e: There are also the Central Food Labeling Watchers (Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries), who make sure there are no misleading food labeling.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: There are also the Central Food Labeling Watchers (Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries), who make sure there are no misleading food labeling.
There are also the Central Food Labeling Watchers (Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries), who make sure there are no misleading food labeling.

sen.j: これに近い例で，身近な社会現象や風俗を観察する分野として路上観察学会というのがある。
sen.e: The example that is similar to these above is the On-the-road Watchers Institute, which observes the social phenomena, manners and customs etc which are familiar to us.
The example that is similar to these is the On-the-road Watchers Institute, which observes the social phenomena, manners and customs etc which are familiar to us.
The example that is similar to these is the On-the-road Watchers Institute, which observes the social phenomena, manners and customs etc which are familiar to us.

sen.j: これについては考現学も参照のこと。
sen.e: See also the section of the study of modern social phenomena about this topic.
See also the section of the study of modern social phenomena about this topic.
See also the section of the study of modern social phenomena about this topic.
